column3: Super Speed Dual Pixel AF OIS
Triple 12MP Ultra Wide and Telephoto cameras
Ultra Wide: ƒ/2.4 aperture and 120° field of view Wide: ƒ/1.8 aperture
2x optical zoom in and 2x optical zoom out; digital zoom up to 10x
